channel.title: Need help with legacy 614 source
channel.description:
When i click run it says
[server] Connecting to vote4tokens database Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://www.legacy614.org:3306/legacy/vote unable to connect to msql press any key to continiue
I need to know how to run it without having all this here but idk how plz help?

item.title: Need help with legacy 614 source
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

it looks like the website was deleted or something, so search through your folder for the we address, and change it to a site that does, or just delete the statement that sends you somewhere.

Read full topic
